channel.title: Projects on Darija's Art
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Darija's Art

item.title: Wooden furniture
item.description: A simple IKEA stool transformed into a romantic coffee table.

item.title: "Kubbestol" (wooden chair)
item.description: Kubbestol (wooden chair) is an exciting experiment combining traditional Norwegian craftsmanship with modern decoration in Darija’s style

item.title: THERE IS NO 'I' (photo & video art project) at Nordic Light International festival of photography in Kristiansund
item.description: Shifting experiential contexts allow for recognition that the so-called “I” exists only so far as a given context.
